messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] NC Unschoolers- Kathy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/6/03 2:19:08 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... WELL DANG!   We are in Conover.. Now get yourself on over to our NCUnschoolers group!   :-)
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/6/03 2:19:08 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
bstamp@... writes:

> What part of NC are you in? We're in the Charlotte area.
>
> Kathy
>

WELL DANG! We are in Conover.. Now get yourself on over to our
NCUnschoolers group! :-) We've amassed over 50 member in two weeks! Our
NCUnschoolers group is designed to help unschoolers in NC (and surrouding states, if its
feasible for them) get to know each other and hopefully meet on occasion. We
are planning a trip to Raliegh this month! There seems to be a big population
of unschoolers in the Triad area. Here's the link to the group.

groups.yahoo.com/group/ncunschoolers

Teresa
btw, nice to meetcha



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
